4.1.1.2.1.2. unduwave.api.wave_api_root

Wave api definitions

4.1.1.2.1.2.1. Classes

wave_api

Wave API-class for controlling basic wave-functionality.

4.1.1.2.1.2.2. Module Contents

class unduwave.api.wave_api_root.wave_api(wave_mode='undu_endp')

Wave API-class for controlling basic wave-functionality. Holds the basic parameter classes.

Parameters:

wave_mode (str) – can be one of the following ‘bfield’, ‘undu_ellip’, ‘undu_endp’ :

_prog_paras
_ebeam_paras
_screen_paras
_spectrometer_paras
_bfield_paras
_undu_paras
run()

Runs wave with the given settings, prepares and postprocesses data

get_results()

Returns the results from a given simulation as result-object.
